title: Clievelandi Vindici√¶, or, Clieveland's genuine poems, orations, epistles, &c. purged from the many false and spurious ones which had usurped his name, and from innumerable errours and corruptions in the true copies : to which are added many never printed before, with an account of the author's life.
author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.
notes: Published according to the author's own copies.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
